Set.Text: Increases the [ICON_PEACE] Faith and [ICON_GOLD] Gold of a city. Only the Incans may build it.
The Ushnu is an Incan unique building that increases the [ICON_PEACE] Faith of a city. Unlike the Temple it replaces, it also yields 1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and has no maintenance cost.

An ushnu is a pyramid-shaped, terraced structure that was used by the Incas to preside over their most important ceremonies. Little is known of Ushnu's Quechua root, but it seemed to mean "the place of stones where the water filters."
